ai-patthana24.15:0.2_0: under the investigation of the Dhamma: Protector of the World, circumstances, and tangledges of clothes.
ai-patthana24.15:1.1_0: Not for the sake of refuge, without cause or reason, with a reason, because of refuge the teaching gives rise to cause or reason.
ai-patthana24.15:1.1_1: A teaching doesn’t give rise to a cause or reason.
ai-patthana24.15:1.1_5: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana24.15:2.1_0: Not for the sake of refuge, without cause or reason,
ai-patthana24.15:2.1_1: or causes and conditions for the sake of refuge.
ai-patthana24.15:2.1_5: What four trivial trees have been uneven.
